name: Lunchtime With King's-Chan!
description:
It's your first day at a new school, and four girls have become your new friends:

  • King's-chan, the outgoing Head of School,
  • Rowing-chan, the intense athlete,
  • Band-chan, the passionate musician and
  • Knot-chan, the wisecracking writer!

Choose your own path and get closer with each of the girls, to reach one of ten unique endings! Who are you spending lunchtime with today?

(Note: afaik you can't type inputs on iPad so you'll need to let them choose the name of things)
